about_the_game:
Step into the Spotlight with Sarah, the Aspiring Actress!

Experience the Glamour of Hollywood with Sarah

Embark on a glamorous romantic journey with Sarah, an aspiring actress with big Hollywood dreams. This captivating content invites you to explore a world of red carpets, auditions, and backstage drama as you connect with this talented and charming character.

About Sarah:

  • Star-Studded Dates: Experience unforgettable dates filled with glitz and glamour, from exclusive premieres to celebrity parties.

  • Shared Passions: Discover Sarah's love for acting, film, and the entertainment industry, and share your own passions with her.

  • Romantic Moments: Create lasting memories as you build a strong emotional connection with Sarah.

  • Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in beautifully environments and character designs that bring Sarah's world to life.

Perfect for Fans of:

  • Romantic visual novels

  • Dating simulators

  • Hollywood

  • Drama and romance

Don't miss your chance to experience the magic of Sarah's story. Purchase the DLC today and start your own Hollywood love story!

Sarah is an aspiring actress with big Hollywood dreams. Her resilience and storytelling charm captivate everyone.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains full nudity, front and back of several all characters

You can set up a scene and simulate sex with a 3D model.

The animations simulate sexual positions, and it is possible to move the camera freely around the scene, having a complete perspective of the sexual act.

There is nothing forced in the game.

All situations and characters were made just to simulate pleasure in a passionate and light way.

It is possible to see in detail the characters facial expressions and erogenous zones, including genitalias. 

You must be legal age of majority or over to play this game.
